properties.title: SchemaCrawler - Maven Site Report Plug-in Example
properties.author: Sualeh Fatehi

section.name: SchemaCrawler - Maven Site Report Plug-in Example

subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The SchemaCrawler Maven site report plug-in example demonstrates the use of SchemaCrawler to generate a Maven site report.

ol.li:
Install
Maven,
and make sure that Maven is on your path.
Copy schemacrawler.config.properties into the maven-site-report example directory.
Copy the hsqldb jar file from distribution directory into the maven-site-report example directory.
Start the database server by running StartDatabaseServer script from the distribution directory.
See the output produced in the target/site directory.
Try modifying the schemacrawler.config.properties with regular expressions, logging, and so on.
Try using different SchemaCrawler commands in the Maven test project's pom.xml file.
Try defining a new database connection, using your favorite database and driver.
